description:
Alexandre Bewcock was an officer in the Free Planets Star Fleet, and a friend/mentor to http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. Alexandre Bewcock served as a commander in the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] Star Fleet for more than four decades, and was considered to be one of the most experienced fleet commanders in the galaxy at the time of the Allianceâ€“Imperial War.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Alexandre Bewcock
